alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Northwest Prince William; Southern Fauquier (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 11:45AM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow and sleet accumulations between a coating to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maryland, Northwest Montgomery and Northwest Howard Counties. In Virginia, Southern Fauquier, Eastern Loudoun and Northwest Prince William Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of snow, sleet, freezing rain, and rain will continue today, with all areas changing over to rain by the early afternoon hours. The rain will come to an end during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Loudoun; Northwest Prince William; Southern Fauquier
